name: Space Federation (itch)
description:
Space Federation is a homebrew game boy game inspired by the classic shoot 'em up from the same platform and the always loved metroidvania style games made with GB Studio.

This game is still in development so it's only the first chapter of the story and may change a bit in future versions.

Controls ActionGame Boy
KeyboardMoveD-PadArrow Keys / WSAD
Jump/interact (Platformer)AZ / J
Shoot
B
X / K
PauseStart
Enter
